briefTitle: An Exploratory Prospective Trial of Rescue Acupuncture for the Treatment of Acute Migraine
officialTitle: An Exploratory Prospective Trial of Rescue Acupuncture for the Treatment of Acute Migraine

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion:

* Patients must be able to get care at Nellis Air Force Base (a military installation) in order to participate in this study.
* Male and female DoD beneficiaries, age 18 years or older, who have been previously prescribed rescue medication to treat their acute migraine episodes.

Exclusion:

* Pregnant
* Absence of ear
* Active cellulitis of ear
* Ear anatomy precluding identification of acupuncture landmarks
* Use of Hearing Aids that preclude the insertion of needles
* Use of anticoagulants
* Unable to drive during rapid onset of migraine or inability to find someone to drive you

primary.description: Change of migraine headache pain from mild, moderate or severe to pain free.
